title: You can't beat Fiora by playing smart
body:
Especially when she start to build tanky.
There is literally **Z.E.R.O** counterplay
The only hope is expecting her to do something extremely stupid, there is nothing **you **can do.

Even the old Fiora is better than this.

More skill added, but less balanced? lmao that's really a hard thing to do, but Riot somehow managed to make it, those designers are really ~~smartass~~ genius.

replies.body: Maybe you should try playing smarter

Once I laned against a Fiora and backed off every single time my vital appeared in front of her to reset it.
Didnt do anything lol

It's worse when you manage to have her go 0/5 in lane, 30 something CS at 20 minutes, and she gets a triple kill by herself on your team.

God damn it.

Unless you hard counter-pick her, then yea, she pretty much always wins the lane. But I don't think she us overpowered. If you play the lane right, you just farm as best you can until team fights. Fiora has poor teamfighting capabilities and is pretty much useless when her ult is on CD. If her ult doesn't spawn the healing aura in a team fight, then you've pretty much eliminated her as a major threat.

> Fiora has poor teamfighting capabilities 

Friendly reminder that we can nolonger lock her down in teamfights as Tanky Fiora is getting popular now.
And no they can still kill anyone(Tank or Squish it doesn't matter) quickly without ult.

I don't think that's true. Her ult and vitals are her only source of damage. Without her ult she is literally just auto attacking for damage, and her autos don't do anything different than any other champion unless they hit a vital.

I once played tanky Olaf and QSSed her entire ult and still died within 5 seconds to a Tanky Fiora
She has a lot of extra damage from her Q, her crit e, and Titanic Hydra (Q proc it as well).

> [{quoted}](name=TheCrimsonSky,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nBOKN5QE,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-02-07T03:20:40.564+0000)
>
> I once played tanky Olaf and QSSed her entire ult and still died within 5 seconds to a Tanky Fiora
> She has a lot of extra damage from her Q, her crit e, and Titanic Hydra (Q proc it as well).

Isn't titanic hydra working too well with AS/aa resets the problem here? I've seen more complaints about titanic yi too lately, something about the titanic juggernaut build works a little too well on characters that are meant to be squishy, or so it seems.
I'd like to see a fiora beat these {{champion:17}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:9}}

{{champion:69}}: Easily Riposte the widely choreographed .75 delayed ultimate
Sidestep Q poison with your Lunge, proceed to smash her face
one doesn't simply cass ult without flashing
Yeah I guess she's in the same boat as {{champion:3}}

> [{quoted}](name=GagOnMySwag,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nBOKN5QE,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-02-07T03:28:43.924+0000)
>
> I'd like to see a fiora beat these {{champion:17}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:9}}

I think the only one that she might have trouble with is Lulu. Why would you even put shaco on the list?
Because AP Shaco is a nightmare for dive based melees.
Shouldn't even be labeled assassin anymore cuz she isn't one. The old one was sorta assassin but this one is just bullshit.
Auto attack champions beat fiora, like tryndamere. and as long as you outplay the riposte you shouldnt have a hard time in lane.
